title: Orchestral music with Japanese, Chinese and Asian vibes for historical games
description: This pack is epic music with the atmosphere of samurai and warlords. It can be used not only for RPG and SLG, but also for games of various genres.
longDescription:
All Tracks Are YouTube Safe!


You can listen to the full song digest.

https://youtu.be/Q6O6ngPkcUo

Apple Music/Spotify/Amazon Music/You Tube Music/AWA/LINE MUSIC


This pack was designed to feature songs for historical games with a Japanese, Chinese, and Asian feel. However, it can be used not only for RPG and SLG but also for games of various genres. Rather than being a narrow pack that only focuses on one game context (like combat or dungeon music), this pack has a little bit of everything. This makes this pack a great starting point for your game music and eliminates the need to buy a bunch of different packs to start your project.


This pack contains the full-length song and a WAV file with the intro and loop sections separated.

If you play the loop section after the intro section has finished playing, you can get endless background music without any noise.


Don't just listen to boring songs that just repeat.Enjoy a magnificent sound with rich intonation and development.


〜Recorded music〜

Overture "The Samurai warriors story "Overture 

Rivalry between warlords 

Conspiracy 

Battle Preparations 

Breath of Spring 

Forest of the Gods 

Outbreak of War 

Merchant 

Cherry blossoms at night 

Fierce Battle

Night market<Subscription not distributed> 

Exploring Japanese History<Not included in this album>

War Kabuki<Not included in this album> 

Sunlight Filtering Through Trees


*The images are generated using AI.
technicalDetails:
Number of audio WAVs: 39

Number of audio cues: 39

Sample rate/bitrate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does the music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 97 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Supported Target Build Platforms: ALL

Important/Note: All sounds are created by me. Takenobu Yamana(Music Creator Yamana)
